data.name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox Demo
data.detailed_description: Take a glimpse into the mysterious city of Balduq with this Ys IX: Monstrum Nox demo. Choose between one of two key locations to explore, and experiment with the brand-new Gifts and Monstrums before your full adventure begins.
data.about_the_game: Take a glimpse into the mysterious city of Balduq with this Ys IX: Monstrum Nox demo. Choose between one of two key locations to explore, and experiment with the brand-new Gifts and Monstrums before your full adventure begins.
data.short_description: Take a glimpse into the mysterious city of Balduq with this Ys IX: Monstrum Nox demo. Choose between one of two key locations to explore, and experiment with the brand-new Gifts and Monstrums before your full adventure begins.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-8320 8-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
